timeline.bodyText:
The screenmap is already set at the PipelineBuilder level, should probably be using that one (a code path to make it available needs to be created), but if you do, then the PreProcess step needs have the screenamap usage disabled.
Even if they are kept separate, the two screenmaps should at least have the exact same config.
timeline.author: aaime

timeline.bodyText: Code should be updated to match the vector tiles context (there is no "renderer screenmap", but the code could be referring to the PreProcess pipeline step screenmap instead).
